duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement and manage DevOps practices, including CI/CD pipelines, source code management, and observability tools.
Utilize Kubernetes and OpenShift expertise to support application deployment, scaling, and management.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to facilitate the migration/replatforming of applications to cloud platforms.
Provide off-hours production support, especially around the November and December holidays.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (Certifications in Kubernetes and OpenShift preferred)
